content: The **Pasir Panjang Group Representation Constituency** was a [group representation constituency](/wiki/Group_representation_constituency) (GRC) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## History In 1988, the GRC was created by merging [Pasir Panjang](/wiki/Pasir_Panjang_Constituency), [Clementi](/wiki/Clementi_Constituency) and [West Coast Constituencies](/wiki/West_Coast_Constituency). In 1991, the GRC was fully absorbed into [Brickworks GRC](/wiki/Brickworks_GRC). ## Members of Parliament YearDivisionMembersParty**Formation**(/wiki/1988_Singaporean_general_election) - Alexandra - Brickworks - Queenstown - [Abbas Abu Amin](/wiki/Abbas_Abu_Amin) - Bernard Chen - [Wan Soon Bee](/wiki/Chay_Wai_Chuen) [PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**Abolished (199****1)** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1980s [General Election 1988](/wiki/1988_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****[Abbas Abu Amin](/wiki/Abbas_Abu_Amin) Bernard Chen Tien Lap [Wan Soon Bee](/wiki/Wan_Soon_Bee)** **38,545** **61.57** [WP](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore)Gan Eng Guan Mohd Taib Sattar Wee Han Kim24,05938.43Majority14,48623.14Total valid votes62,60498.32Rejected ballots1,0671.68[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)63,67195.6[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)66,600[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat) This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pasir Panjang Group Representation Constituency
